replies.body: i didnt get the chest and key i go 35 points wtf
It's punishment for selling you soul to become a Yasuo player.
As per the FAQ, you will receive the chest+key within 24 hours of the battle completing. The battle is completing about 20 mins from now.
But i havent received it yet
The prize has been unlocked, so if you have more than four points by the end of the battle - you'll then receive the reward within 24 hours!
I have done -20hp over everyone do you mean four points just on the seal or overall
You need four points overall by the end of the battle. You're good to go!
Are these points the 'Total Contribution'?

Yep! On the bottom of the page or in the client there will be a section that says "Total Contribution" - the number after that is the one you're looking for! If that is 4 or above by the end of this battle, you're golden!
Thank you!

Not a complaint and I'm not sure these are related but I appear to have been given a second four-win IP boost today? I already used up the one from joining ocean week, just wondering why I got another one/if I was supposed to get another one :)
Did you take part in the OPL tipping contest over the weekend? I believe there was a 4-win IP involved with that due to everyone getting a perfect week 1
Ah! I totally forgot about that :P Thanks, I was just slightly worried I'd somehow got it instead of my chest :D Also woo perfect week!

how do I know if I qualified for it
if you could check could you tell me?

From what I can see, you signed up after this prize was handed out. You needed to have four points by the time the third battle was completed to get the reward.

You can still get two other hextech rewards though, if you can do the following:

* Get 10 points by the end of the event, and the community wins the Final Battle
* Get 20 points by the end of the event.
I have 26 points, trying to beat my last years score of 75, whats you guys goal?

0 i beat it by 21 so far XD
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I like how "Twister Treeline" is going to be used in this event, yet the queue is never used. These events are nice to keep us coming back, but draft norms and ranked 3v3's for treeline is a needed addition considering they are ment to be part of the game.

Ranked 3v3s are enabled each Thursday currently - and we're always investigating ways to have modes on as long as possible while still having the queue be successful. Check out[ this thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/wgM0WBsO-queue-schedule-updated-dec-1st) and[ this thread,](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/aAfOmVeI-oce-preseason-ranked-queue-testing-updated-dec-1st) but otherwise thanks for the feedback!
i dont receive the mystery gisting and the chest with the key and i got 20 point
As per the FAQ, you will receive the chest+key within 24 hours of the battle completing.

I Still haven't got it?? :c rip Hextech Chests!!!
was the hextech key and chest throughout the whole ocean week? i didn't receive one
If you earned 4 points before the end of yesterday's battle then you will have received the chest and key by now. It would have appeared in your Loot inventory.
Where can i find my points??
If you log into the updated client you'll find them on the Ocean Week tab in the bottom left corner

My total contribution is 16 HP so does that mean I have got 16 points?
7 of the games were on the bonus map so I got 14 points and 2 others were normal.
Yep, each HP is worth 1 point.
Im confused my total contribution is 13hp so i do get the loot im very confused by this years ocean week

If you contributed 4 or more points (damage done to monster) before the end of Monday AEDT, you earned a Hextech Chest and Key. It can take some time to get the rewards out but I believe they have now been distributed.

i still didnt get the self mystery reward
{{champion:19}}
This reward unlocked the ability to buy self mystery skin purchases with double legendary skin chance in the store. You'll find on on the front page of the in client store.
